title: Philly's annual Hero Thrill Show set for this Saturday at Sports Complex
text:
Published By: Philly News - Today 
The 61st Annual Hero Thrill Show, which benefits survivors of police and fire personnel killed in the line of duty, is set for Saturday outs...
